txt.en: Maginard wants you to kick any cave-claws you find inside the tunnel to the south-east of the Staddle village centre. Use your Claw Kickin' Boots to send the beasts flying.
'Hah! Did it, did you? Very good, that will teach them a lesson! They won't return, mark my words, and if they do, they'll get another kick.'
You have given the thieving cave-claws a swift kick, just as Maginard suggested. You should return to him and tell him of your deed.

Maginard wants you to kick any thieving cave-claws you find inside the tunnel under Staddle. To do so safely, you must have a sturdy pair of kicking boots. Maginard told you of a nearby crate of such boots in the Staddle village centre.
Get a pair of Claw Kickin' Boots from the crate

This crate contains sturdy boots of various sizes, perfect for kicking cave-claws. Maginard suggested you take a pair for yourself.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must slot the boots as a skill. To do so, drag the 'Claw Kickin' Boots' item from your inventory to your skill bar. You then use the skill on Thieving Cave-claws to advance the quest.</rgb>
Maginard Foxbolt knows there are cave-claws causing trouble in Staddle and has some ideas of his own on how to deal with them.

'Everyone's going on about the thieving shrews, but there's not enough talk about the thieving cave-claws if you ask me. Of course, those worthless constables do nothing. I grew up out in the Shire proper, and the Bounders would never allow such things to happen, I tell you. No indeed, they would give those thieving cave-claws a swift kick that they wouldn't soon forget!

'If you're planning on going into that shrew-tunnel and you see a cave-claw, that's what you ought to do. Kick them so hard they'll think Bullroarer Took himself did it, and they won't come back, I promise you that!

'You'll want some sturdy boots, though. Cave-claws are right pointy. As a matter of fact, there's a crate of such boots just over yonder. Help yourself, most folk here don't want them.'

Maginard chuckles and wiggles his hairy toes.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
